title: Reliance Power plans to raise ₹6,000 cr to expand operations
description: Reliance Power plans to raise ₹6,000 crore to expand its operations after becoming a debt-free company. The board will meet to consider raising funds through various means, including preferential issues and foreign currency convertible bonds. Reliance Infrastructure also announced a significant fund-raising plan to reduce its debt and enhance business operations.
